name: Monster Movie, Color
description: The PDX Sanderson Sisters are a unique group portraying a legendary trio of characters from a Halloween classic that is obligatory viewing every year. I originally created this as artwork for a book about cosplay and cosplayers called ‘Heroes and Villains: The Fantastic Brought to Life.’ My partner and I are still going to bring it to life, so if you find yourself with a print of this on the wall, I’ll be sure to update you when the full book is available. It’s going to be a great project!
